articles.title: Left, ABVP students clash in JNU over eating non-veg food on Ram Navami - India Today
articles.description: Students of the left-wing and ABVP clashed on the JNU campus on the day of Ram Navami. Left-wing students accused ABVP of stopping them from eating non-veg food, while ABVP students accused the left-wing of preventing them from worshiping in the hostel.
